TextView.android:text: Is woman is still pregnant?
Kya Woman Abhi Tak Pregnant hain?
Is this ANC visit?
Kya Yah ANC Visit h?
Key ANC messages for household and woman
\n Antenatal care k zarori messages
1. Provide Iron and folic acid tablets to pregnant woman
1. PW ko iron k kali and folic acid k peeli golian day di
2. Counsel on Tetanus Toxoid Vaccination
2. Tetanus k injection k maloomat day deen
3. Recommended schedule of TT vaccination
3. Tetanus k injection k tarteeb bata di
4. Explain proper nutrition of pregnant woman
4. PW ko hamaal k doran khurak k maloomat
5. Counsel on proper rest and workload
5. Maloomat hamaal k foran araam n kaam k noiyat
6. Promoting recognition of danger signs during pregnancy
6. Hamaal k doran khatray k aalmat k pehchaan
7. Counsel on safe and clean delivery place
7. Saaf suthri jaga par delivery karwain
8. Choosing a birth attendant
8. Birth attendant ka sahi intikhaab
9. Protecting the neonate from infection
9. Paida honay walay bachay ho infection sa bachana
10. Promoting clean birth/delivery kit
10. Delivery k liya saath delivery kit ka intikhaab
11. Promoting bathing care
11. Nahanay ka tareeqa
12. Promoting cord care
12. Naaf k saif n care
13. Birth notification to our health worker within 72 hours of birth
13. Pidaish k 72 hours k andar andar hamari team member ko aagah karna
14 Exclusive breastfeeding
14. Pidaish k baad bachay ko sirf aur sirf maa k dhoodh pilana
15. Childhood immunization
15. Pidaish k baad bachay ko hifazati injection lagana
16. Location of vaccination center
16. Hifazatai teekoun k markaz k jaga
17. Hygiene of mother and newborn
17. Maa aur bachay k safai and suthrai
Special messages related to Exclusive Breastfeeding
Key Exclusive Breastfeeding messages
\n Bachay ko sirf aur sirf Maa ka dhood pilanay k zarori maloomat
1. Hold your newborn skin-to-skin immediately after birth. This will keep your baby warm and breathing well, help him or her reach the breast easily, and help you and your baby feel close
1. Apnay bacha ko apnay app sa jooray rakhain paidaish k foran baad. Takay app ka bacha garam rahay and asani sa sans lay sakay, aur us ko jald sa jald ma ka dhood dain
2. Begin breastfeeding within the first hour of birth. Early breastfeeding helps the baby learn to breastfeed while the breast is still soft, and helps reduce your bleeding.

2. Maa ko chahiya k bachay ko apna dhood pidaish k aik ghantay k andar andar shuru karwa day takay bacha jaldi sa jaldi dhood peena seek lay, jab tak breat naram ha, and is sa maa k bleeding ma bh kami ho gee
3. Colostrum, the thick yellowish milk, is good for your baby
3. Ma ka pehla doodh jo k peelay rung ka hota ha, bachay k liya bay hud mufeed ha
4. Colostrum helps protect your baby from illness and helps remove the first dark stool
4. Ma ka pehla dodh bachay ko har tarhan k beemarioun sa mehfooz rekhta ha, and us ko pehlay pakhana jaldi a jata ha
5. Breastfeed frequently to help your breast milk ‘come in’ and to ensure plenty of breast milk.
5. Maa bachay ko jitna zayda dhood peelai gee us sa dhood k miqdar ma izafa ho ga
6. Do not give water or other liquids/fluids to your baby during the first days after birth. They are not necessary and are dangerous for your newborn.
6. Bachay ko maa k dhood k ilawa koi bh dosri cheez masla pani, shaihad, juice nahi daina khuch din tak. Dhood k ilawa har cheez bachay k liya nuqsanday ha
7. Do not give anything else, not even water, during your baby’s first 6 months
7. Paidaish k baad 6 mahinay tak bachay ko sirf maa ka dhood daina ha, yahan tak k pani bh nahi
8. Breast milk provides all the food and water that your baby needs during the first 6 months
8. Ma ka dhood bachay ko har tarhan k gazaiat day daita ha, har tarhan k khorak and pani jo bachay ko 6 mahinay tak chahiya
9. Even during very hot weather, breast milk will satisfy your baby’s thirst.
9. Sakht garmi ma bh maa ka dhood bachy k peeas bh khatam karnay k liya kafi ha
10. Giving your baby anything else will cause him/her to suckle less and will reduce the amount of breast milk that you produce.
10. Agar maa baachay ko khuch aur day gee tu us sa bacha ma aka doodh kaam peeya ga and us sa dhood bh ana kaam ho jay ga
11. Water, other liquids and foods can make the baby sick
11. Pani, dosray mashroob and upper sa di hoi khorak app k bachay ko beemar kar day gee
12. You can give medicines if they are recommended by your health provider
12. Bachay ko agar doctor k mashwaray k baad koi deewai dainay k zarorat paray tu wo di ja sakti ha
13. Breastfeed on demand, both day and night (8 to 12 times) to build up your breast milk supply
Bachay ko maa ka dhood din ma 8 to 12 dafa daina lazmi ha, us sa maa ko dhood bh wafer miqdar ma ai ga
